meanings.sent1: The bread was the stalest I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The old crackers were the stalest snacks at the party.
meanings.sent3: The joke he told was the stalest one in the book.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were the stalest in the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The air in the abandoned room was the stalest, making it hard to breathe.
